description: This simple spring salad is packed with greens and bright flavours.
name: Lamb, Broad Bean & Mint Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large griddle or frying pan on a medium high heat. Brush the lamb steaks with 1 tbs of olive oil and add to the pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium. Remove from the pan, wrap in foil and rest for 3 minutes.
Bring the broad beans to the boil in a small saucepan of water, cook for 1-2 minutes, drain and refresh under cold water.
Whisk together the remaining oil and ingredients for the dressing in a small bowl.
Scatter the rocket, torn mint leaves and broad beans on a large serving plate, top with crumbled feta, thinly sliced lamb and a drizzle of the dressing.
